title: Is the double engine of Modi Government so incompetent that a state has been engulfed in violence for nearly two months? How is George Soros able to orchestrate such plots in India? Is Amit Shah stupid?
selftext:
I saw some comments on social media that Manipur violence has been orchestrated by George Soros and Congress. Couldn't help it. Apparently, George Soros has been orchestrating every little scheme against Modiji. He has become so powerful in India, that even ‚Äúchanakya‚Äù Amit Shah is unable to stop him. First Nehru, now Soros. Why is everyone conspiring against Modiji? This is so unfair.

Must read,

[Manipur displays Narendra Modi‚Äôs idea of India](https://caravanmagazine.in/commentary/manipur-violence-narendra-modi-idea-of-india)

[Manipur violence: 9 BJP MLAs write to PM Modi, say people lost trust in state government - India Today](https://www.indiatoday.in/india/story/manipur-violence-bjp-meitei-mlas-narendra-modi-memorandum-people-lost-trust-biren-singh-government-2395774-2023-06-21)

[His house burnt, Union minister admits Manipur government has failed to maintain law and order- The New Indian Express](https://www.newindianexpress.com/nation/northeast/2023/jun/16/his-house-burnt-union-minister-admits-manipur-government-has-failed-to-maintain-law-and-order-2585668.html)

[Manipur | PM Narendra Modi leaves for foreign trip, waiting delegation from Manipur dismayed - Telegraph India](https://www.telegraphindia.com/india/pm-narendra-modi-leaves-for-foreign-trip-waiting-delegation-from-manipur-dismayed/cid/1946511)

['Not Given Enough Time to Speak at Shah's All-Party Meet,' Says Ibobi Singh, Only Manipur Representative](https://thewire.in/rights/okram-ibobi-singh-manipur-amit-shah)

[Three Delegations From Violence-Struck Manipur Have Failed to Meet PM Modi](https://thewire.in/government/manipur-violence-narendra-modi-silence-mlas-teams)

[Narendra Modi | Manipur residents boycott Mann Ki Baat, stomp on transistor sets to protest against PM‚Äôs silence - Telegraph India](https://www.telegraphindia.com/north-east/manipur-residents-boycott-mann-ki-baat-stomp-on-transistor-sets-to-protest-against-pms-silence/cid/1946074)

[‡§Ø‡§π ‡§ï‡•à‡§∏‡§æ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§π‡•à ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§∞‡§æ‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§è‡§ï‡§§‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡§ø ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡§æ ‡§≤‡§æ‡§™‡§∞‡§µ‡§æ‡§π ‡§π‡•à? - ‡§∏‡§Æ‡§§‡§æ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó](https://samtamarg.in/2023/06/28/what-kind-of-nationalism-is-this-that-is-so-careless-about-the-unity-of-the-nation/)

[‡§Æ‡§£‡§ø‡§™‡•Å‡§∞: ‡§¶‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§Ç‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§ò‡§∞ ‡§ú‡§≤‡§æ‡§è ‡§ó‡§è | Homes of ministers burnt in Manipur - YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsAK8TnqFtc)

[‡§Æ‡§£‡§ø‡§™‡•Å‡§∞: ‡§è‡§ï ‡§Æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡•á ‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡•á‡§ï‡§º‡§æ‡§¨‡•Ç | Manipur in turmoil for over a month - YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fbdYPNNN4W4)

["‡§Æ‡§£‡§ø‡§™‡•Å‡§∞ ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§∞‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•á ‡§≠‡§∞‡•ã‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ñ‡§º‡§§‡•ç‡§Æ" | "Lost faith in Manipur govt" - YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=58jtaZ3Kk5Q)
comments: Bingo on Amit Shah.. but people who believe in his words and deluded and gullible..

Keep quiet. 

We're all UCC experts now.

Rihanna  was apparently  the mastermind  for the Farmer's  protest under the "international  conspiracy  theory " .Amit Shah nd Modiji ain't stupid ,their followers   on the other hand ..they could literally  hold  üëΩ responsible  for some  other shit tomorrow  nd bhakts would actually  buy that crap ..
It's the Indians that are stupid
Nothing left for our leader to take picture with, or probably remind him of his past crimes from 2002... Maybe the smell of burnt corpses affect his taste buds.
India is a joke and Modi the comedian

No, they are not stupid. They just think the Indian people are the stupid ones.

Soros or Beyonce (& others) are all conspiring against the country - guess who buys into this stupidity? The people.

Also, note the retweets by the celebrities (film, sports,etc) who continue to spread the word of these jokers.

Not to forget the massive technological infrastructure of the  BJP IT cell, which works 24x7 through Twitter, Whatsapp, YouTube etc to ensure no one is missed.

You know that dialogue from Guru which goes along the lines of Jab log tumhare khilaaf bolne lage samajh lo tarakki kar rage ho, (When people start bad mouthing you, know that you are ahead of the game), samesies.
Time to ban all outside relations /s
is that why people talk against ISIS and Taliban?

I think the meaning of democracy is lost in a so called "double engine" strategy. Democracy's true power comes from not who is elected, but from who stands in opposition. It's the opposition's ability to act as the guy who checks every nook and cranny for any faults or shortcomings by the party in power and bringing them to light is invaluble, no matter how good or excellent of a job any government might be doing. No one is perfect, we all need criticism to grow and prosper. Otherwise, if only one party is calling all the shots and no one is there to question them, what's the use of democracy? Why even have sooo many political parties? Just install a monarchy/autocracy. Why even bother printing ballots and wasting money?  
But sadly due to weak/non existent/incompetent opposition, no one credible is left to question what the gov does anymore, who are free to peddle bullshit like "double engine government" propoganda.  
I really hope RG grows both as a person and a political figure, for the sake of all of us, everyone including the bhakts, congress supporters, everyone, as Indians.  
Also regarding the George soros, I really find it hard to believe such a seemingly omnipotent and powerful org like BJP with all it's might cannot stop all this violence in manipur. It's rather like they WANT it to continue. BJP has found this tactic of scaring people into voting for them and their scare tactics have now become a cancer to the rest of the country.  The only solution is having a strong regional party to support and look after the interests of the locals rather than party officials from somewhere who understand next to nothing about a secluded and foreign place. People need to understand the diversity of India as a country where the spoken language and dialect changes for every 100kms and it cannot possibly be ruled by one and only party. Even the British had a hard time keeping it all together until they finally broke it up and left. We fell into that trap by congress and suffered for a good 60 years without major changes to the leadership, which allowed corruption and stagnation to fester. A strong opposition was missing then too. Infact, their incompetency is what led the BJP to its power i would argue. Let's not let it happen again. You either die a hero or live long enough to see yourself become the villian.

You know it makes you wonder. If so many violent cases are caused by foreign bodies and terror outfits, wtf is Home Ministry doing? Spying on what Rahul Gandhi is eating for lunch? It's your job to stop it dilweed, this is a failure of intelligence (in both the police sense and intellect sense)

Seems like I need to put in the /s , the movie is loosely inspired by papa Ambani, glamorises munafa and and in general business related skulduggery, most of the dialogues are along the lines of what our Majesty has said over the years.
You do know this is a global conspiracy to malign India and destabilise the elections right? Manipur is a plot to draw the PMs attention away from the other important campaigns and electoral matters.
George Soros is not even  in charge of his villainous empire any more. His son took over. Smh
When the clowns ü§° rule the circus or when the insane patients take over the asylum
Suddenly Raga stands up and yells I AM BATMAN üòÇ

I mean he ticked of the batman checklist 

1. Born in wealth 
2. Lost his dad at an early age 
3. Has a million dollar empire behind him
4. Tries to be edgy (debatable)
5. Thinks he can magically solve most of India's social ills (debatable)

Muddyji is basically an incredibly lucky but dumber penguin (Gotham TV series)

1. Born poor
2. Grew up on the streets 
3. Incredibly charismatic 
4. Rises through the ranks of an underground organization 
5. Joins politics 
6. Wins a high ranking post 
7. Encourages cronyism 
8. Craves to be loved
9. Craves to be considered an elite
Georgie screwing Modi is the permanent theme for nut job bhakts

Stop generalizing maan.

My astrologer read the skid marks of the cowdung outside a temple this morning at 5:47am, and realized on good authority that George Soros is Nehru reincarnated.

How many letters in S O R O S and N E H R U ?

How many letters in J A W A H A R L A L and G E O R G E ?

Do your research people.
You forgot the /s
r/fuckthes
The biggest joke is that BJP Bhakat is worried about France.
